Events that occurred on 8 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1913 - Engagement of J.R.R. Tolkien and Edith Bratt
1938 - Voice actor Michael Graham Cox is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 54.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien reads over The New Shadow and most likely starts typing a final typescript.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 319.
2004 - The Return of the King video game is released in Japan.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring reach Hollin. Crebain appear.
Full moon[1]
